charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Sasori (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) has been resurrected in the ageless body that he had always wanted during his life. He is sent out to the battlefield in Akatsuki's ambush squad.

abilities.name: Chakra Threads
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) uses Chakra Threads. For 3 turns damage to Edo Tensei Sasori (S) will be reduced by 10 points and Puppet Manipulation will deal an additional 5 damage.

abilities.name: Ally Control
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) uses Ally Control on one ally. For 1 turn all non ranged enemy skills used on that character will be reflected to the user of that skill. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Puppet Manipulation
abilities.description: Using Puppet Manipulation Edo Tensei Sasori (S) deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn non affliction damage that enemy deals will be reduced by 5. If the health of the target of this skill drops to 35 or below after this skill is used on them their physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Falling Guard
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sasori (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
